fields.name: jdc_person_id
fields.title: JCOIN data commons person identifier
fields.description: The generated unique identifier specific to the JCOIN Data Commons for a given individual (client or staff).

fields.name: quarter_enrolled
fields.title: Quarter Enrolled
fields.description: The financial quarter and year of enrollment

fields.name: state_of_site_enrollment
fields.title: State of Site For Enrollment
fields.description: The U.S. State abbreviation of the site where client (participant) was initially enrolled

fields.name: current_study_status
fields.title: Current Study Status
fields.description: A summary of the current status where client (participant) is in study

fields.name: o2
fields.title: Gender Identity
fields.description: Gender identity

enum: Genderqueer/gender nonconforming/neither exclusively male nor female

custom.notes: For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.]  False if not 'Male' and not 'Transfgender' else True

fields.name: d4b
fields.title: Gender Identity (condensed)
fields.description: A condensed version of the gender identity common data element

custom.notes: For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.]

fields.name: d3_white
fields.title: Race: White
fields.description: Denotes person with European, Middle Eastern, or North African ancestral origin who identifies, or is identified, as White.

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

fields.name: d3_black
fields.title: Race: Black or African American
fields.description: A person having origins in any of the Black racial groups of Africa. Terms such as "Haitian" or "Negro" can be used in addition to "Black or African American". (OMB)

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

fields.name: d3_american_indian
fields.title: Race: American Indian or Alaska Native
fields.description: Denotes a person having origins in one of the indigenous peoples of North America, who lived on the continent prior to the European colonization. The term includes individuals belonging to a large number of tribes, states, and ethnic groups, many of them still enduring as communities.

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

fields.name: d3_hawaiian
fields.title: Race: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
fields.description: Denotes a person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. The term covers particularly people who identify themselves as part-Hawaiian, Native Hawaiian, Guamanian or Chamorro, Carolinian, Samoan, Chuukese (Trukese), Fijian, Kosraean, Melanesian, Micronesian, Northern Mariana Islander, Palauan, Papua New Guinean, Pohnpeian, Polynesian, Solomon Islander, Tahitian, Tokelauan, Tongan, Yapese, or Pacific Islander, not specified.

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

fields.name: d3_asian
fields.title: Race: Asian
fields.description: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam. (OMB)

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

fields.name: d3_other
fields.title: Race: Other
fields.description: A person having origins in a race not identified with other racial categories presented

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

fields.name: d3_specify_tribe
fields.title: Race: American indian principal tribe or community specified
fields.description: The specific principal tribe or community if the person answered answered 'yes' to this racial category

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

fields.name: d3_specify_other
fields.title: Race: Other specified
fields.description: The specific racial category of a person having origins in a race not identified with other racial categories presented

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

fields.name: d2
fields.title: Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish Origin
fields.description: A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin regardless of race

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Are you of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin?

fields.name: d4c
fields.title: Sexual orientation
fields.description: Sexual orientation

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself asâ€¦?

fields.name: d4c_specify_other
fields.title: Sexual orientation:  Other specified
fields.description: The specific other sexual orientation of a person having a sexual orientation other than the categories presented

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself asâ€¦?

fields.name: d4d
fields.title: Ever pregnant
fields.description: Denotes whether person has ever been pregnant

enum: Previously pregnant,did not have a child

custom.notes: Does this just apply to that past 90 days?  If not, then the participant should be able to check more than one response.

fields.name: d5
fields.title: Marital status
fields.description: Marital status

fields.name: d5a
fields.title: Married with partner
fields.description: Denotes whether unmarried person is living as married with romantic partner

enum: Yes,I am living as married with partner
No,I am not living as married with partner

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Are you currently living as married with a romantic partner?

fields.name: d6
fields.title: Education
fields.description: The highest level of education completed

enum: but less than 1 year of college credit
1 or more years of college credit

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

fields.name: d6_grade
fields.title: Education:  Highest grade level (if less than GED or h.s. diploma)
fields.description: Highest grade level completed, if less than GED or high school diploma

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is the highest grade completed?

fields.name: d6_specify_other
fields.title: Education: Other specified
fields.description: Denotes educational status other than categories presented

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

fields.name: u14f
fields.title: Interviewed during incarceration
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the person was interviewed during incarceration

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Interview conducted with participant during incarceration?

fields.name: u14g
fields.title: Days incarcerated (in past 30/xx days)
fields.description: Number of days incarcerated in past 30/xx days

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past xx/30 days, how many days have you been incarcerated?

fields.name: u15
fields.title: Medication ever prescribed for opioid use disorder?
fields.description: Indicates whether or not participant has ever been prescribed medication for OUD

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Have you ever been prescribed and taken medication to treat opioid use disorder?  (Illicit use should be excluded.)

fields.name: u15a1
fields.title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Lifetime months
fields.description: Number of months participant was prescribed and took buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Lifetime months (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])

fields.name: u15a2
fields.title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Past 30/xx days PTI # days
fields.description: Number of days in past 30/xx PTI days participant was prescribed and took buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Past 30/xx days PTI days (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])

fields.name: u15a3
fields.title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Past 30/xx PTI days dose/day
fields.description: Dose per day (in the past 30/xx days PTI) of buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual

custom.notes: Dose/day is the dose taken most often during the 30 days PTI or past 30 days
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Past 30/xx days PTI dose/day (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])

fields.name: u15a4
fields.title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Past 30/xx days
fields.description: Number of days in past 30/xx days participant was prescribed and took buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Past 30/xx days (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])

fields.name: u15a5
fields.title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Past 30/xx days dose/day
fields.description: Dose per day (in the past 30/xx days) of buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual

custom.notes: Dose/day is the dose taken most often during the 30 days PTI or past 30 days
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Past 30/xx days dose/day (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])
